p: Another significant response of plants to water stress is the increase in the synthesis of secondary metabolites (Lazzari et al. 2012; Cordoba et al. 2021; Eriksen et al. 2021; Jogawat et al. 2021). With the increase in drought, the plant produces different antioxidant molecules such as polyphenols and carotenoids with the aim of counteracting oxidative stress (Jogawat et al. 2021). Humanity has exploited this potential to produce new supplements and pharmaceutical products with antioxidant activity (Lazzari et al. 2012; Mastinu et al. 2012, 2021; Kumar et al. 2019; Gupta et al. 2020).
